pli-tv-pvr3:75.1: The abstract of the thirteen (classes of) origin has indeed been well taught.
pli-tv-pvr3:75.3: The impossibility of an occasion for confusion
pli-tv-pvr3:75.4: is in accordance with the rules as guide:
pli-tv-pvr3:75.5: Bearing this in mind, wise men
pli-tv-pvr3:75.6: do not get confused about origin.
